title: 13: S5E13 – "A Dangerous Dance" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors James Colton, Brian Martinez, Jacob A. Martz, and Thomas Anthony Lay, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about malevolent museums, horrific homes, nightmarish neighbors, and evil elementals.




Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
